full_text:
Business Record Certification
(Name and address of business entity)
I, Deborah Trautwein, hereby certify that I am the Records Custodian, or other qualified person for: (name of business or institution) BellSouth Telecommunications, Inc.
I, Deborah Trautwein, hereby further certify that the following memorandum, report(s), record(s), or data compilation, in any form, of acts, events, conditions, or diagnosis, to wit:
1. Subscriber, billing and toll records (Copies of bills)
2. Telephone #561-832-4117 for - 11/29/05 through 2/14/05,
3.
4.
were made at or near the time at which the information contained thereon was received by, or from information transmitted by, a person with knowledge of the information contained thereon, and further, that the information is kept in the course of a regularly conducted business activity of name of business or institution. I further certify that it was the regular practice of that business activity to make such memorandum, report, record, or data compilation.
Deborah Trautwein
(signature of Declarant)
4/19/05
Date
STATE OF FLORIDA
COUNTY OF PALM BEACH
Before me this day personally appeared who, being duly sworn, deposes and says that the information contained in this affidavit is true and correct.
Sworn to and subscribed before me this day of , 2003.
NOTARY PUBLIC, State of Florida
My commission expires:
07/26/17
Page 6 of 104
Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031623

I, Deborah Trautwein, hereby certify that I am the Records Custodian, or other qualified person for: (name of business or institution) BellSouth Telecommunications, Inc.
I, Deborah Trautwein, hereby further certify that the following memorandum, report(s), record(s), or data compilation, in any form, of acts, events, conditions, or diagnosis, to wit:

2. Telephone #561-832-4117 for - 11/29/05 through 2/14/05,

were made at or near the time at which the information contained thereon was received by, or from information transmitted by, a person with knowledge of the information contained thereon, and further, that the information is kept in the course of a regularly conducted business activity of name of business or institution. I further certify that it was the regular practice of that business activity to make such memorandum, report, record, or data compilation.

STATE OF FLORIDA
COUNTY OF PALM BEACH
Before me this day personally appeared who, being duly sworn, deposes and says that the information contained in this affidavit is true and correct.

additional_notes: The document is a Business Record Certification form filled out by Deborah Trautwein, Records Custodian for BellSouth Telecommunications, Inc. The form certifies the authenticity of certain business records. The document contains handwritten and printed text. The notary section is not completed.
